text: Tadera prabhu takhana tadera ahbane sara dilena -- ''ami niscaya'i biphala karabo na tomadera madhyera karmidera kono kaja -- purusa ha'o ba nari -- tomadera ekajana an'yajana theke, sutaram yara hijarata kareche o tadera gharabari theke yara bahiskrta hayeche, o amara pathe yara niryatita hayeche, ara yara yud'dha kareche o nihata hayeche -- nihsandeha tadera dosatruti tadera theke abasya'i muche deba ara nihsandeha tadera abasya'i prabista karaba sbargodyanasamuhe yadera nice diye baye cale jharanaraji -- ekati puraskara allah‌ra darabara theke. Ara allah -- tamra kache rayeche aro uttama puraskara.’’
